title: The Fall of Jericho
summary: Joshua 6 describes how Israel conquers Jericho. Following God’s instructions, the people march around the city for seven days. On the seventh day, the walls collapse after a trumpet blast and shout, and the city is destroyed—except for Rahab and her family.

faq.question: How did the walls of Jericho fall?
faq.answer: After marching for seven days and shouting on the seventh, God caused the walls to collapse.

faq.question: Who was spared in Jericho?
faq.answer: Rahab and her family, because she protected the spies.
